message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with video question answering, which involves understanding both language and vision. This suggests that it could belong to several sub-categories, including computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and multimedia (cs.MM). Among these, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely categories, as they are directly related to the tasks of visual and textual understanding, respectively. The paper also discusses various video representation strategies, which could fall under cs.LG and cs.AI. Finally, the fact that the dataset is derived from the ActivityNet dataset suggests that cs.MM could also be a relevant category.
